title: Generative AI at work
description: The Bad The DeSantis Campaign Texted Me with a Large Language Model by Alan Johnson + Microsoft Publishes Garbled AI Article Calling Tragically Deceased NBA Player “Useless” by Victor Tangermann (Futurism) + The A.V. title: It’s ok if not everyone gets it
description: This view of satire—that [it] fails if some dullard doesn’t understand it—dovetails into the popular idea of art as moral instruction in which the greatest failure a work of art can do is confuse someone about the intended message. Art isn’t osmosis. There’s no way to force everyone to absorb your intended message. Focusing on […]

title: Rethinking utilities
description: Utilities are necessary services that should be affordable and accountable to the public. My water utility sends me an annual water quality report so I can trust the tap water is safe. My use-based utilities provide meter reads in every bill to show I’m being billed for my own usage. They’re often run directly by […]
